Text: The <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>CHAMPION EVENT</font> is a limited-time challenge where you can earn <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SOUL SHARDS</font> for a specific Champion.
If you earn enough <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SOUL SHARDS</font>, you can summon that Champion from the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SHARDS</font> tab in the Summon menu.
In this challenge, you will fight wave after wave of the featured Champion, each harder than the last.
The more <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ROUNDS</font> you defeat in an attempt, the more <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SOUL SHARDS</font> you will win.
Champion Event

The Dark Bull Demon King guards <font color='{element_dark}'>DARK ELIXIRS</font>, a type of <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCENSION ELIXIR</font> needed by Dark Champions to <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCEND</font>.
Although <font color='{element_light}'>LIGHT CHAMPIONS</font> will deal more damage to this boss, they will also take more damage in return!
The <font color='{element_dark}'>DARK BULL DEMON KING</font> has no other elemental strengths or weaknesses, so you can bring a mix of your best Fire, Water, and Nature champions!

This boss will inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.ongoing} ONGOING DAMAGE</font> on your Champions, which deals damage equal to a percentage of their <font color='{maxhp_green}'>MAX HP</font> over time.
Bring Champions with skills that can <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>REMOVE DEBUFFS</font> or apply the <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.immunity} IMMUNITY</font> buff to protect them from debuffs.

Another good strategy is to inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.disorient} DISORIENT</font> on the Dark Bull Demon King. A disoriented enemy has a chance to fail when inflicting debuffs, including Stun, on your Champions!
Dark Bull Demon King

The <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ELDER DRAKE</font> is a vicious beast that <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.raise_atk} RAISES ATK</font> and can <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.stun} STUN</font> your Champions with its roar. It will also fly out of reach and breathe fire from afar!

Try to even the playing field with skills that <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.raise_atk} RAISE ATK</font> and <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.raise_def} RAISE DEF</font>, or lower the Drake's stats with <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.lower_atk} LOWER ATK</font> and <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.lower_def} LOWER DEF</font>.

Another good strategy is to inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.disorient} DISORIENT</font> on the Elder Drake. A disoriented enemy has a chance to fail when inflicting debuffs, including Stun, on your Champions!

The Elder Drake's hoard includes rare and powerful <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>GEAR</font>. The higher the stage of difficulty, the better chances of finding gear with more <font color='{star_gold}'>{icon.star}STARS</font>.
The highest stages of the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ELDER DRAKE</font> have the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>BEST-QUALITY GEAR</font> in the game.

Legends say that the Elder Drake's lair is the only place to find {icon.gearset9} DAZZLING gear!
(Adds 25% Chance to {icon.stun} STUN on Skills.)
Elder Drake

The Fire Bull Demon King guards <font color='{element_fire}'>FIRE ELIXIRS</font>, a type of <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCENSION ELIXIR</font> needed by Fire Champions to <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCEND</font>.
<font color='{element_water}'>WATER CHAMPIONS</font> deal more damage to this boss, so it is a good idea to bring them in your party!
As he takes damage, the Fire Bull Demon King <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.raise_atk} RAISES ATK</font> and attacks more quickly.
Try bringing Champions with skills that <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.lower_atk_spd} LOWER ATK SPD</font> or <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.lower_atk} LOWER ATK</font>.
Fire Bull Demon King
The Golden Bull Demon King provides <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SPIRIT ELIXIRS</font>, a type of <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCENSION ELIXIR</font> used by Champions of all elements.
This boss has no element and does not have any particular strength or weakness. You can use the best Champions you have available, no matter their element.

Higher stages are more difficult but have a much better chance of dropping the higher-quality Ascension Elixirs you need for <font color='{star_gold}'>4{icon.star}</font> and <font color='{star_gold}'>5{icon.star}</font> Champions!
Make sure you defeat this boss as often as possible to stay stocked up on <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SPIRIT ELIXIRS</font>!
Golden Bull Demon King

The Light Bull Demon King guards <font color='{element_light}'>LIGHT ELIXIRS</font>, a type of <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCENSION ELIXIR</font> needed by Light Champions to <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCEND</font>.
Although <font color='{element_dark}'>DARK CHAMPIONS</font> will deal more damage to this boss, they will also take more damage in return!
The <font color='{element_light}'>LIGHT BULL DEMON KING</font> has no other elemental strengths or weaknesses, so you can bring a mix of your best Fire, Water, and Nature champions!
The Light Bull Demon King has high <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font> and his <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>CRYSTAL</font> <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.raise_def} RAISES DEF</font>.

Try bringing Champions with skills that <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.lower_def} LOWER DEF</font> or deal damage that <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>IGNORES </font><font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font>.
Light Bull Demon King

The Nature Bull Demon King guards <font color='{element_nature}'>NATURE ELIXIRS</font>, a type of <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCENSION ELIXIR</font> needed by Nature Champions to <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCEND</font>.
<font color='{element_fire}'>FIRE CHAMPIONS</font> deal more damage to this boss, so it is a good idea to bring them in your party!

The Nature Bull Demon King's <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>CRYSTALS</font> give him <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.invulnerability} INVULNERABILITY</font> and <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>HEAL</font> him.
Try bringing Champions with skills that <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>REMOVE BUFFS</font> or inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.mortal} MORTAL WOUNDS</font>, which block healing.
Another good strategy is to <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>DESTROY</font> the Bull Demon King's <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>CRYSTALS</font> quickly so they can no longer support him.
Nature Bull Demon King

The <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>STEEL WIDOW</font> is a powerful war machine. Its weapons can ignore <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font> and inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.ongoing} ONGOING DAMAGE</font>.

<font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.ongoing} ONGOING DAMAGE</font> deals damage equal to a percentage of <font color='{maxhp_green}'>MAX HP</font> over several seconds, so having high <font color='{maxhp_green}'>MAX HP</font> or <font color='{def_yellow}'>DEF</font> is less helpful in this fight.
Instead, try to bring Champions that can <font color='{menu_highlight_white}'>REMOVE DEBUFFS</font> or grant your party <font color='{buff_blue}'>{icon.immunity} IMMUNITY</font> from them.

Watch out for <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>WEB BOMBS</font>! If your Champions are caught in the blast, they will be <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.immobilize} IMMOBILIZED</font>, preventing them from dodging the Steel Widow's beams.

The Steel Widow Boss Raid is the only place to find <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.gearset11} ADEPT</font> (-30% Cooldown), <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.gearset6} MORTAL</font> (+45% Crit Damage), and <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.gearset10} VAMPIRIC</font> (+30% Lifestealing) gear.
Steel Widow

The Water Bull Demon King guards <font color='{element_water}'>WATER ELIXIRS</font>, a type of <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCENSION ELIXIR</font> needed by Water Champions to <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCEND</font>.
<font color='{element_nature}'>NATURE CHAMPIONS</font> deal more damage to this boss, so it is a good idea to bring them in your party!
The Water Bull Demon King has high <font color='{maxhp_green}'>MAX HP</font>. Don't let him outlast you!

Bring champions with skills that inflict <font color='{debuff_red}'>{icon.ongoing} ONGOING DAMAGE</font>, which deals damage equal to a percentage of <font color='{maxhp_green}'>MAX HP</font> over several seconds.
Water Bull Demon King

Choose a 3-letter tag representing your Guild Name.
- Must be more than 2 characters.
- Must not be a duplicate of an existing tag.
- Must not contain profanity.
Guild Tag

Choose a Guild Name between 2 to 12 characters.
- Must not be a duplicate of an existing name.
- Must not contain profanity.
Guild Name
Guild XP
Energy spent by all Guild Members is converted into Guild XP.

Defeat other players to earn <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.currency_pvp} BATTLE EMBLEMS</font> and <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.trophy} TROPHIES</font>! Losing a match decreases your trophy count.

<font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.currency_pvp} BATTLE EMBLEMS</font> can be used to buy rewards from the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>PVP TAB</font> in the Shop, like the rare <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>TUTOR FUZZLEPUFF</font> used to <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>LEVEL UP SKILLS</font>.
Matches are <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>BEST 2 OUT OF 3</font> (the first player to win 2 <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ROUNDS</font> is declared the winner).
Players can attack you at any time, including while you are not playing. Make sure you set up a good <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>DEFENSE TEAM</font>!

If the timer runs out, the defender wins automatically. Using strong <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>TANK</font> and <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SUPPORT</font> Champions can increase your chances of winning on defense.

You can <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>REFRESH</font> your list of opponents for free every 2 minutes or use <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.currency_hard} GEMS</font> to refresh again immediately. Defeating all players in the list will automatically refresh it.
Arena

Each Champion can <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCEND</font> to their ultimate form to gain a permanent stat boost and sometimes unlock a <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>NEW SKILL</font> or <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SYNERGY TRAIT</font>.

In order to <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCEND</font>, a Champion must consume <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCENSION ELIXIRS</font>. The amount and type varies for each Champion, and is based on the element of the Champion.

There are two types of <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCENSION ELIXIRS</font>. Each Champion requires a mixture of <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ELEMENTAL ELIXIRS</font> matching their element and neutral-element <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SPIRIT ELIXIRS</font>.

Get <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ELEMENTAL ELIXIRS</font> by slaying the elemental <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>BULL DEMON KING</font> in Boss Raids. Different elements appear on different days, so remember to check the schedule!

<font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SPIRIT ELIXIRS</font> can be found by slaying the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>GOLDEN BULL DEMON KING</font> in Boss Raids. All types of Elixirs can be purchased in the Bundles tab in the Shop.
The cost of <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ASCENSION</font> is independent from other ways of powering up your Champion, so it doesn't matter whether you want to Promote it first.
Ascension

<font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ULTIMATE BLITZ</font> is test of strength and strategy. Each <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ROUND</font> is harder than the last, with better rewards as you advance.

Every <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>FIVE ROUNDS</font> there is a bigger <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>REWARD</font>. If you can beat the last Round, you win a <font color='{star_gold}'>LEGENDARY DISC</font> used to summon <font color='{star_gold}'>4{icon.star}</font> to <font color='{star_gold}'>5{icon.star}</font> Champions.

Your progress and rewards <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>RESET EVERY MONTH</font>, so you can come back again and again for great prizes. There are also separate prizes per <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>DIFFICULTY</font>!
As you progress you will face many unique combinations of enemies. The key to victory is not just power, but mastering different strategies and party compositions.

Pay close attention to the <font color='{buff_blue}'>BUFFS</font> and <font color='{debuff_red}'>DEBUFFS</font> that your Champions bring to the fight, as well as their elements and unique skill effects.

In Ultimate Blitz, you can use <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.tactical} TACTICAL MODE</font> in the upper-right corner of the HUD. This allows you to pause and give commands to each of your Champions.
Ultimate Blitz
Each <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>CHALLENGER</font> has their own preferred team of Champions. It will always remain the same.

Defeating Challengers is a quick and easy way to earn <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.currency_hard} GEMS</font> and <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.currency_pvp} BATTLE EMBLEMS</font>.

<font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.currency_pvp} BATTLE EMBLEMS</font> can be used to buy rewards from the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>PVP TAB</font> in the Shop, like the rare <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>TUTOR FUZZLEPUFF</font> used to <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>LEVEL UP SKILLS</font>.
After beating a Challenger, they will be unavailable for a while. Make sure to check in regularly to see if there are any Challengers ready to fight!
Challengers
Equipping <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>GEAR</font> is one of the best ways to improve the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.battlerating} BATTLE RATING (BR)</font> of your Champions.

Each piece of Gear belongs to a <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>GEAR SET</font>, indicated by the set icon in the upper-right corner. Sets give powerful <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SET BONUSES</font> if you have enough matching pieces.
Like Champions, pieces of Gear with more <font color='{star_gold}'>{icon.star}STARS</font> are more powerful. However, there is no way to add Stars to a piece of Gear.

You can spend {icon.currency_soft} Gold to <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>UPGRADE</font> a piece of Gear. This increases its stats and gives it <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>NEW STATS</font> at certain levels, but will never change the set bonus.

Gear can be found in <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ADVENTURE</font> mode. Each <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>BOARD</font> in Adventure has a different Gear Set. An Adventure Scenario will always drop Gear with the same set and slot.

Find the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>BEST GEAR</font> in the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ELDER DRAKE</font> and <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>STEEL WIDOW</font> Boss Raids. Higher stages of difficulty give you a better chance to find Gear with more <font color='{star_gold}'>{icon.star}STARS</font>.
Gear

<font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.battlerating} BATTLE RATING (BR)</font> is a measurement of your Champion's overall power and increases whenever it increases its stats or its skills level up.

Stats can be increased by equipping and upgrading <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>GEAR</font>, gaining <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>LEVELS</font> by Training or playing Adventure mode, and by gaining <font color='{star_gold}'>{icon.star}STARS</font> through Promotion.

Max HP (MAX HP) is the amount of damage your Champion can take before dying.
Defense (DEF) reduces how much damage it takes from enemy attacks and skills.

Attack (ATK) increases the damage dealt with most attacks and skills.
Attack Speed (ATK SPD) makes you attack more often.

Crit Rate (CRIT) is the chance of each attack or skill to deal extra damage.
Crit Damage (CRIT DMG) increases the bonus damage when you score a critical hit.

Accuracy (ACC) increases your chance of applying DEBUFFS to your enemies.
Resistance (RES) decreases the chance of an enemy applying DEBUFFS to you.
Champion Stats
<font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>MISSIONS</font> are meant to guide you through the game and help you discover new game modes.
Most missions follow a natural progression and are completed using previously acquired rewards. Make sure you <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>CLAIM</font> all your rewards!
Use the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>ARROWS</font> on the sides of the screen to look at Chapters you have not completed yet.
Keep an eye out and plan for the future! You can earn new and powerful <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>CHAMPIONS</font> by completing some Chapters!
Missions

The first skill is known as a <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>BASIC SKILL</font>. This is your primary attack and has no cooldown. How often this skill is used is based on the <font color='{spd_skyblue}'>Attack Speed (ATK SPD)</font> stat.
All other skills have a <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.cooldown} COOLDOWN</font> time before they can be used again. Usually, the more powerful a skill is, the longer the cooldown.

Skills may also apply <font color='{buff_blue}'>BUFFS</font> and <font color='{debuff_red}'>DEBUFFS</font> that are essential for victory. You can find descriptions of them in the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>GUIDE</font> tab of the <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>MISSIONS</font> menu.

To increase the level of a skill, <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>TRAIN</font> a Champion using a <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>TUTOR FUZZLEPUFF</font> as <font color='{upgrade_material}'>MATERIAL</font>. They can be purchased from the PvP tab of the Shop.

You can also gain skill levels by <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>TRAINING</font> a Champion using the same Champion of any element as <font color='{upgrade_material}'>MATERIAL</font>. This is the best use for duplicate Champions.
Some Champions have a <font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>SYNERGY TRAIT</font>, which is a passive benefit the Champion can give to their whole party. Only one of these can be active at a time.
Skills
Unlock a 2nd Champion slot after completing Scenario 2 of Board 1
Unlock a 3rd Champion slot after completing Scenario 10 of Board 1
Unlock a 4th Champion slot after completing Scenario 10 of Board 2
Locked Slot
<font color='{tutorial_highlight}'>{icon.battlerating} BATTLE RATING (BR)</font> is a measurement of your Champion's overall power and increases whenever it gains stats or levels up skills.
Stats can be increased by equipping and upgrading GEAR, gaining LEVELS by Training or playing Adventure mode, and by gaing STARS through Promotion.
A Champion can level up skills if it is TRAINED using another of the same Champion of any element as a MATERIAL, or if a Tutor Fuzzlepuff is used as a material.
Choose which Champion you use as your Social Avatar and which to Share with your Friends by tapping the Options icon (a small cog just above this help button).
5v5-eligible Champions have separate stats just for 5v5 multiplayer -- they start the battle with Base Stats, but grow stronger until reaching their Max Stats.
